root: ^HEY!! You found your way here, not too difficult I hope?!

INTRODUCTION: ^You are who i think you are right? I am Noah.
^Oh yeah just got a little startled
^Dont jump out at me like that!

c-0: ^No worries, how about i show you to our table?
c-1: ^Nice to meet you too! How about we get seated and take if from there?
c-2: ^That was uncalled for i am sorry, just got spooked
^Just be more careful in the future

c-0: ^Its fine... it happens. Anyhow should we get seated?...

c-1: ^Its okay... really, we all get a little nervous sometimes!
^Right... anyways table is this way should we get seated?...

c-0: ^Well now that we are seated hows the day been?!
^Quite exciting the craziest thing just happened!
^I had a little trouble getting here
^Maybe i should get us something to drink?

c-1: ^OH? Dont just leave me hanging here go on tell me!
^A kitten was stuck in a tree and i had to save it!
^I almost got run over by a car!
^I saw someone slip on a banana peel! Just like in the cartoons!
^A parrot landed on my shoulder and told me how the day would go!

c-0: ^damn thats crazy, you wanna get a drink to celebrate?

c-1: ^I'll tell them this ones for the kittens haha
^ohhh that was you! Had to veer out of the way really quickly haha, close one!

c-0: ^Dont worry just messing with ya! haha
c-2: ^Ah come on i was just joking!

c-0: ^...heh yeah... Anyhow we should probably get something to drink...
c-1: ^... Anyhow we should probably get something to drink...
c-2: ^...*sigh*...*rolls his eyes*... You really aint no fun huh
^Woah really?! I wish i could have seen that!
^Yeah i could barley hold in my laughter haha

c-0: ^haha, bet! This deserves a drink or two, let me get you something!
c-1: ^haha, bet! I would have laughed out loud you got more constraint than me! Should get a drink to remember this moment!
^Would that not just make us forget faster?

c-2: ^HA! We dont need something that strong yet

c-3: ^SWEET! i wish I had gotten to that first! How about a drink to celebrate?
c-4: ^It said you where gonna by me a drink
^It said you where a secret serial killer!

c-1: ^NO WAY MY SECRETS BEEN EXPOSED, YOU MUST DIE! Haha
^Better get you something before we get to that aye?
c-2: ^WOAH,Better make the best of it then, can i get you something to drink?
^Yeah this place can be a damn maze sometimes but glad you could make it!
^So am I! lets get started shall we!

c-1: ^I see well you're here now, could i get you something to drink?

c-0: ^Alright now then what you want to start with the drinks are on me!
^Oh well maybe just the first one then haha
^Too late! no taking it back now!
^NOOO! you cant do this to me think of my bank account! If only i had a discount to make the drinks cheaper... wouldnt that be nice?
^Yeah, those are hard to come by i hear
^Sure do! Working here certainly got its perks!
c-1: ^Oh definetly, getting hold of one is not an easy task. Luckly for you tho i have already gone though that process so to say!

c-0: ^you're currently speaking to this employee of the month! Or rather employee of the month 2 months ago haha

c-1: ^Good to hear! but the first one is on me really! Cant be sitting on an employee discount and not use it!
^Ofcourse! Got to flex that employee discount! Besides would have been rude not get you anything.

BackstoryDialogue: ^Ah so this is where you work!

c-0: ^You atleast read my profile i see, said i was a bartender but never said where! But yes this is the place
^Its great honestly would say it suits me perfectly! Get to talk to people serve drinks have a couple of laughs and party! What more can a man really ask for? Haha
^Sounds like you found something that really suits you
^Yes! Spot on observation i would say, if i didnt make it so obvious ofcourse haha
^So about that drink you promised me
c-1: ^What can i say i like my job, lots of people i meet while working dont have that luxury.
^Not at all! Never been as relaxed as when i am on the job talking to customers serving cold drinks, i mean sure people arent always behaving the best but its overhaul great!
^It seems to suit you quite well

c-0: ^Well, not for everybody i suppose... not sure i get why one would not like it but whatever...

c-1: ^Sure do! Quite cozy dont you think?

c-0: ^Glad you agree! Never am as relaxed as when i am behind the bar serving drinks and chatting up costumers! Suits me perfectly i would say
c-1: ^It all just blends into the surroundings for me, kinda relaxing honestly not like a metal concert or anything thats fucking loud if anything.

c-0: ^Meh, just not my thing really. Prefer other types of music but i dont have any grudge against it or anything, plenty of good bars out there playing metal on repeat if youre interested.
^What like apple juice or milk? Come on you could get something better!
^Rather not start with alcohol just yet
^Oh right, sorry... i get it, you will get something nice i promise! Not everything behind that counter is alcohol Ofcourse! Be right back!
c-1: ^Fair, but a little boring ill get you something good still! Not everything behind that counter is alcohol Ofcourse. Be right back!
^NOW WE ARE TALKING! This is how you start a night out! Will be right back!
c-2: ^Alright Starting off light thats respectable, ill be right back!
c-3: ^Bold haha, you wont regret it tho promise! Ill be right back!

c-0: ^...*He marches over to the bar in a brisk pace... He starts talking to the bartender and hangs back on the counter. He smiles at you*
^...*He looks happy... The drinks seems to be done now... He walks back to the table*
c-1: ^...*He makes a face back and looks amused... The drinks seems to be done now... He walks back to the table*
c-2: ^...*He leans back against the counter... The drinks seem to be done now... He walks back to the table

c-0: ^Alright here you go, enjoy! Its been picked with special care by yours truly!
^.*Noah seems to have gotten a large pint of beer, and is chugging it down quite rapidly*...So hows your drink?
^Its great the flavours really come together
^Thats great to hear! I always prefer a nice flavorful one if am just getting a one or a few. Taking it slow and steady really getting to know all the flavours!
c-1: ^Thats good to hear. Old reliable is a great start as always and a common one at that gets people to come back to the bar, heh cant say we arent encouraged to get that effect going!
c-2: ^Ah thats a shame, getting a mediocre drink first is a bummer but always easy to fix on the second try! Experimenting with new drinks is a great way to find new favourites as well!

DrinkAtTable2: ^You sure have alot to say about drinks

c-0: ^There is a reason i work here right? Its a bit of a passion of mine you could say, people that dont have a love for drinks dont do as well in my opinion.
^Idk people can be good bartenders still
^Yeah, without that passion you will only get so far, true for any profession id say!
c-1: ^Oh sure but the best in the business always got that passion, just working will only get you so far!

MinigamePrelude: ^Say i got something special planned for tonight, privilege of having a chill boss you could say...

c-0: ^You'll get to make your very own drink! Using some of the special stuff we got behind the counter! Hows that for a first date activity! Haha
^Thats the spirit! I get the things ready right way! Just come behind the bar when youre all done with your drink
c-1: ^Ah come on! It doesnt have to be amazing the first time! Just try and not kill me haha! Come behind the counter when youre all done!
c-2: ^Just give it your all and it will go well trust me! Come behind the counter when youre all done!

BAD_DATE_END: ^I dont think this is gonna work out...

c-0: ^yeah... i had a feeling... we should probably just call it right here save both of us some time, have a great evening...

REALLY_AND_WHAT: ^Good i was ready to blow up on you! haha

c-0: ^haha, heh thanks! Should i get us something to drink?
c-1: ^...Should i get us something to drink?
c-2: ^Haha yeah glad that wasnt me, a true moron that driver must have been right? Should get us some drinks to celebrate your continued survival! haha

JobTalk: ^Guess i am lucky as well i enjoy my job

c-0: ^A common sentiment, usually they are right but they just dont have luck,money or skill to get there. I am sure you will get something you like doing eventually if you work hard enough for it!

c-1: ^Thats great! glad to hear it honestly! Wish more people had it that way. But enough about that how about i get you a drink?
c-2: ^Not found a job yet so could be better

c-0: ^I see, not sure that counts as proper unemployment tho Haha
c-2: ^You will get there i belive in you!
